welcome.heading: The power of lightning in your browser

intro.send_desc: Lightning transactions happen all in your browser. No alt+tab or QR-code scanning needed.
intro.paywall_desc: Define individual budgets for websites to enable seamless payment streams. No more annoying paywalls.
intro.privacy_desc: Use lightning to authenticate and control your privacy.
intro.foss_desc: Completely open code that can be audited by anyone. No stats or trackers. You are in control.

set_password.title: Protect your wallet
set_password.description: Your wallet is securely encrypted with a password and needs to be unlocked before usage.
set_password.confirm_password_label: Let's confirm you typed it correct:

choose_connector.title: Do you have a lightning wallet?
choose_connector.description: You need to first connect to a lightning wallet so that you can interact with your favorite websites that accept bitcoin lightning payments!
choose_connector.alby_desc: Create or login to your Alby account
choose_connector.lndhub_desc: Connect to your Bluewallet mobile wallet
choose_connector.bitcoin_beach_desc: Create or connect to a Bitcoin Beach (Galoy) account
choose_connector.bitcoin_jungle_desc: Create or connect to a Bitcoin Jungle (Galoy) account

test_connection.loading: Initializing your account. Please wait, this can take a minute...
